actions.description: The aartuk makes two Branch attacks, two Radiant Pellet attacks, or one of each.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 3 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Branch

actions.description: 2 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (3d4) radiant damage.
actions.name: Radiant Pellet

actions.description:
The aartuk casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability:
1/day each: revivify, tongues
actions.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)

specialTraits.description: The aartuk can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
specialTraits.name: Spider Climb
